channel.title: [pi]npc drop's
channel.description:
So im trying to add drops for Rock crabs i want it to drop 500k but it drops 1gp
My NPCDrops.cfg 1265 995
My NPCDROPS.tsm #RockCrab 1265:50 995:500000 995:500000 995:500000 995:500000
And Npcconstants.tsm 1265 995
